item.title: Photometric Stereo
item.description: Photometric stereo involves estimating 3D structure given several images where only lighting conditions vary. Done for a project course at Lund University, based on a research paper.

item.title: Paper Transformations
item.description: Given an image including an A4 paper, performs perspective correction to show what the paper looks like from directly above.

item.title: Neural Network in Haskell
item.description: Neural network implementation entirely from scratch, from matrix multiplication to gradient descent. I made it in Haskell, one of my favorite languages.

item.title: Mandelbrot Viewer
item.description: Mandelbrot and Julia set viewer made in Scala. Enjoy their stunning beauty while listening to epic music that is also integrated in the GUI!
